dissertation_title: From Coding Agent to the General Agent: Research into Real-world Coding Agents and Advanced Agent Algorithms

code_repository_review.description: This GitHub repository, nano-code, contains the source code for a coding agent system. It is essential for reviewing the current code structure, understanding the working principles of the agent, and forming the base for conducting optimization experiments. file clone to /Users/gengjiawei/repos/nano-code
